propositions.text: The document is titled '蝴蝶公墓'.
The document consists of a deeply nested hierarchical structure.
The primary heading is '蝴蝶公墓'.
Subsequent sections are also titled '蝴蝶公墓' and are organized hierarchically using Markdown heading syntax (# to ######).

concepts.name: 蝴蝶公墓
concepts.context: This is the repeated title of the document and all its headings, indicating the central theme or subject matter. Its high frequency suggests it is the sole focus of the document.

concepts.name: Markdown headings
concepts.context: The structure of the document is defined by Markdown's heading syntax (from # to ######), which creates a visual and logical hierarchy.

concepts.name: Hierarchy
concepts.context: The repetition of headings at increasing levels of depth (# to ######) signifies a strong hierarchical organization within the document.

hierarchy.structure: The document exhibits a strict, deeply nested hierarchy using Markdown headings. The primary title is '# 蝴蝶公墓', followed by numerous sections and sub-sections, all also titled '蝴蝶公墓', organized from level 2 (##) down to level 6 (######).
